page.title: 02Summary.
page.content: Buxted Park and Deer Park is considered to be a local beauty spot. This consists of a church,manor house ,lakes,woodland and deer.Even though it is within easy access of the town of Uckfield and the surrounding villages of Buxted,Framfield and Five_Ash_Down we were surprised by the small number of local people who visited the park even occasionally. In this mainly rural setting it was hardly surprising to find that most people worked on the land,while those living in Uckfield and Framfield mostly worked in white collar industries in the surrounding urban centres of Eastbourne, Brighton, Tunbridge_Wells and London.
